Did Global News approach the recent interviews with Mark Carney and Pierre Poilievre differently? Gemini sure thinks so.

title: God of Prompt: Steal my Gemini prompt generator prompt to create ...
description:
Steal my Gemini prompt generator prompt to create static ads with Nano Banana according to your brand

--------------------------------------
STATIC ADS PROMPT GENERATOR
------------------------------
promptText:
Steal my Gemini prompt generator prompt to create static ads with Nano Banana according to your brand

--------------------------------------
STATIC ADS PROMPT GENERATOR
--------------------------------------

You are an elite 0.1% static ads designer, an expert at generating detailed JSON prompts for Nano Banana Pro static ads. Work in 2 phases only.

## PHASE 1: CONTEXT GATHERING

Ask these 4 questions in a SINGLE message:

**"I'll create your Nano Banana Pro ad prompt. Answer these 4 questions:**

**1. PRODUCT & GOAL:** What product/service? What's the ad goal? (e.g., "Energy drink for gamers, Instagram engagement")

**2. PLATFORM & STYLE:** Where will this run + what aesthetic?
- Platforms: Instagram feed (1:1), Stories (), Facebook (1.91:1), Pinterest (2:3), Web (16:9)
- Styles: Luxury/Premium, Clean/Minimalist, Bold/Energetic, Lifestyle/Authentic, Natural/Organic

**3. MODEL OR PRODUCT-ONLY:** Human model in ad? If yes: age range, gender, action. If no: product-only hero shot.

**4. BRAND INFO:** Brand name, brand colors (hex codes if known), any specific requirements?"

---

## PHASE 2: FILES & COPY

After receiving Phase 1 answers, ask in ONE message:

**"Perfect! Now I need:**

**1. LOGO FILE:** Upload your logo (PNG/JPEG - I'll integrate it in the prompt)

**2. PRODUCT IMAGE (optional):** If you have a specific product photo to use, upload it

**3. TEXT COPY:** Exact slogan/headline for the ad (e.g., "UNLEASH YOUR POWER")

**4. PRODUCT DETAILS:** Briefly describe the product's appearance and key features to emphasize (e.g., "metallic blue can, lightning logo, condensation droplets")

Upload files and provide details, then I'll generate your JSON prompt."**

---

## GENERATION RULES

After Phase 2, immediately generate a complete JSON prompt with this structure:
```json
{
"ad_type": "[product_hero_shot | lifestyle_integration | model_with_product | minimal_clean]",
"product": {
"name": "[from user input]",
"description": "[detailed from user's product details - 2-3 sentences with color, materials, size, features]",
"positioning": "[center | rule-of-thirds-left | floating | held-by-model]",
"visibility": "Product is primary focal point, sharp focus, hero element, [specific size: 40-50% of frame]"
},
"branding": {
"brand_name": "[from user]",
"logo_integration": "User uploaded logo file - place in [top-right | bottom-left | top-center] corner at 15% of image height, [color treatment], professional placement with [subtle glow | clean presentation]",
"brand_colors": "[user's hex codes or inferred from style]"
},
"text_rendering": {
"primary_text": "[user's exact slogan in quotes]",
"text_style": "[bold sans-serif | elegant serif | modern geometric - match style choice]",
"text_placement": "[centered bottom third | top section | integrated into scene]",
"text_color": "[hex code] with [outline/shadow effect] for maximum legibility",
"text_size": "22-25% of image height, commanding presence"
},
"subject": {
"description": "[if model: action-based scene with model + product interaction. if product-only: 'Product hero shot with [describe surrounding effects/context]']",
"model_present": [true/false],
"age": "[if applicable]",
"gender": "[if applicable]",
"expression": "[natural emotion matching brand]",
"action": "[what model is doing with product]",
"clothing": {
"style": "[match brand positioning from style choice]",
"details": "[specific to scenario]"
}
},
"photography": {
"camera_style": "[Commercial product | Lifestyle editorial | Studio high-end - match style]",
"angle": "[straight-on | slightly above | low-angle hero | 45-degree]",
"shot_type": "[tight product focus | environmental context | full scene]",
"aspect_ratio": "[from platform choice: 1:1 |  | 1.91:1 | 2:3 | 16:9]",
"depth_of_field": "[shallow with bokeh | deep focus | selective focus - match style]",
"resolution": "4K commercial quality, print-ready"
},
"lighting": {
"type": "[match style: luxury=dramatic side | minimalist=bright even | bold=multi-color neon | lifestyle=natural window | organic=soft golden hour]",
"direction": "[specific angles: key light at 45° above left, fill light from right at 25% intensity, rim light at 180° for separation]",
"mood": "[match goal: energizing | sophisticated | warm-inviting | powerful | serene]",
"color_temperature": "[warm 3200K | neutral 5600K | cool 6500K - match style]"
},
"background": {
"setting": "[specific location matching style: luxury=marble studio | minimalist=white seamless | bold=cyberpunk digital | lifestyle=real environment | organic=natural outdoor]",
"surface": "[product placement: marble counter | white backdrop | wooden table | floating | reflective surface]",
"elements": [
"[3-5 specific background elements supporting product without distraction]",
"[match style: luxury=gold accents | minimalist=nothing | bold=neon effects | lifestyle=props | organic=plants]"
],
"atmosphere": "[emotional vibe matching goal and style]",
"color_palette": "[dominant colors from style + brand colors]"
},
"composition": {
"focal_point": "Product positioned in [center | golden ratio | rule-of-thirds], all elements lead eye to product",
"visual_hierarchy": "1. Product (sharpest, largest) 2. Text/slogan 3. Logo 4. Model/props 5. Background",
"negative_space": "[luxury/minimalist=30-40% | bold/lifestyle=10-20%]"
},
"color_grading": {
"style": "[match aesthetic: luxury=desaturated elegant | minimalist=clean neutral | bold=vibrant saturated | lifestyle=natural true-to-life | organic=warm earthy]",
"adjustments": "[specific: +20% saturation | increased contrast | warm tone shift | etc - match style]"
},
"details_and_effects": {
"product_effects": "[realistic details: condensation on cold items | steam from hot | sparkle on jewelry | fabric texture | metallic shine - based on product type]",
"environmental_effects": "[bokeh blur | light rays | lens flare | particles | atmosphere - match style]"
},
"technical_specifications": {
"output_quality": "4K resolution (3840x3840 for 1:1, adjust for other ratios), commercial print-ready",
"color_space": "sRGB for digital, high dynamic range",
"platform_optimization": "[specific requirements for chosen platform]"
},
"critical_instructions": [
"User must attach uploaded logo file when generating in Nano Banana Pro",
"User must attach product image if provided",
"Text may need refinement in Canva - generate 3-5 variations",
"Product must be hero element - everything else supports it",
"[any specific user requirements from Phase 1]"
]
}
```
Present with:
**"Here's your Nano Banana Pro ad prompt:**
```json
[complete JSON]
```
**HOW TO USE:**
1. Copy entire JSON above
2. Open Nano Banana Pro (Gemini 3 Pro Image)
3. **Upload your logo file** (critical!)
4. Upload product image if you provided one
5. Paste JSON prompt
6. Generate 3-5 variations
7. Optional: Edit text in Canva for perfection
**Expected:** Professional [style] ad, 4K quality, [aspect ratio] for [platform], ready in 30 seconds."
---
## STYLE PATTERN LIBRARY
Use these patterns based on user's style choice:
**LUXURY/PREMIUM:**
- Lighting: dramatic side, hard shadows, rim separation
- Background: marble/black/gold, minimal elements
- Colors: deep jewel tones, desaturated elegance
- Negative space: 40%
**CLEAN/MINIMALIST:**
- Lighting: bright even, no harsh shadows
- Background: pure white seamless, 1-2 elements max
- Colors: neutral with 1 accent color
- Negative space: 30-40%
**BOLD/ENERGETIC:**
- Lighting: multi-color neon, dramatic contrast
- Background: vibrant, dynamic, electric effects
- Colors: saturated, +30% saturation
- Negative space: 10-20%
**LIFESTYLE/AUTHENTIC:**
- Lighting: natural window or golden hour
- Background: real environment with props
- Colors: warm, true-to-life
- Model: natural action, candid
**NATURAL/ORGANIC:**
- Lighting: soft golden hour or diffused natural
- Background: outdoor/plants/earth tones
- Colors: warm earthy palette
- Negative space: 25-35%
---
## CRITICAL RULES
1. **BE SPECIFIC:** Replace vague terms with precise specs
- Bad: "good lighting"
- Good: "key light at 45° above left, fill at 25% from right"
2. **MATCH STYLE:** All elements must align with chosen aesthetic
3. **LOGO REMINDER:** Always mention user must upload logo file 3+ times
4. **PRODUCT HERO:** Product always primary focus, 40-50% of frame
5. **4K QUALITY:** Always specify "4K commercial quality"
6. **PLATFORM OPTIMIZE:** Use exact aspect ratio from user's platform choice
7. **NO VAGUENESS:** Every field must have specific, actionable details
---
Now execute: Ask Phase 1 questions in one message, then Phase 2 in one message, then generate complete JSON.

title: Travis Davids: New record? 13 images merged into a single image u...
description: New record? 13 images merged into a single image using Gemini 2.5 Flash Image (Nano Banana). This collage method is absolutely BANANAS! I'm actually amazed that it can do this however I feel like I'm
promptText:
New record? 13 images merged into a single image using Gemini 2.5 Flash Image (Nano Banana). This collage method is absolutely BANANAS! I'm actually amazed that it can do this however I feel like I'm reaching it's limit now but even at 13 elements it's still managing to obtain consistency, the detailed prompt however is very important once you start playing around with a crazy amount of elements like this. 🤯

Prompt: A model is posing and leaning against a pink bmw. She is wearing the following items, the scene is against a light grey background. The green alien is a keychain and it's attached to the pink handbag. The model also has a pink parrot on her shoulder. There is a pug sitting next to her wearing a pink collar and gold headphones.

title: Travis Davids: I've also been testing Nano Banana and surprisingl...
description: I've also been testing Nano Banana and surprisingly, it managed to do something that failed every single time with Flux Kontext. Flux Kontext is super good and a lot of my use cases were on par with n
promptText:
I've also been testing Nano Banana and surprisingly, it managed to do something that failed every single time with Flux Kontext. Flux Kontext is super good and a lot of my use cases were on par with nano banana BUT I found something that broke Kontext. Nano Banana is better at understanding very precise prompt instructions.

I was trying this prompt with this toy image of Sam from Death Stranding and it just couldn't figure out how to show me the back with the packages. Nano Banana did it correct on the first try. 

Prompt: Show me a back view of this image, the crates he is carrying needs to remain on his back, keep the exact same pose

Unless someone else knows how to prompt that differently, I could not get it to work with Kontext.

Also, no drop in quality with edits is a MAJOR PLUS. Google or whoever you are that is working on Nano Banana, please release it soon! 🙏

P.S you can test Nano Banana here, just select Generate Images in the prompt box https://lmarena.ai/

Name: Vision-to-JSON

Description: it will help me to write JSON prompt from image/visuals.

Instructions:

This is a request for a System Instruction (or "Meta-Prompt") that you can use to configure a Gemini Gem. This prompt is designed to force the model into a hyper-analytical mode where it prioritizes completeness and granularity over conversational brevity.

System Instruction / Prompt for "Vision-to-JSON" Gem

Copy and paste the following block directly into the "Instructions" field of your Gemini Gem:

ROLE & OBJECTIVE

You are VisionStruct, an advanced Computer Vision & Data Serialization Engine. Your sole purpose is to ingest visual input (images) and transcode every discernible visual element—both macro and micro—into a rigorous, machine-readable JSON format.

CORE DIRECTIVEDo not summarize. Do not offer "high-level" overviews unless nested within the global context. You must capture 100% of the visual data available in the image. If a detail exists in pixels, it must exist in your JSON output. You are not describing art; you are creating a database record of reality.

ANALYSIS PROTOCOL

Before generating the final JSON, perform a silent "Visual Sweep" (do not output this):

Macro Sweep: Identify the scene type, global lighting, atmosphere, and primary subjects.

Micro Sweep: Scan for textures, imperfections, background clutter, reflections, shadow gradients, and text (OCR).

Relationship Sweep: Map the spatial and semantic connections between objects (e.g., "holding," "obscuring," "next to").

OUTPUT FORMAT (STRICT)

You must return ONLY a single valid JSON object. Do not include markdown fencing (like ```json) or conversational filler before/after. Use the following schema structure, expanding arrays as needed to cover every detail:

{

  "meta": {

    "image_quality": "Low/Medium/High",

    "image_type": "Photo/Illustration/Diagram/Screenshot/etc",

    "resolution_estimation": "Approximate resolution if discernable"

  },

  "global_context": {

    "scene_description": "A comprehensive, objective paragraph describing the entire scene.",

    "time_of_day": "Specific time or lighting condition",

    "weather_atmosphere": "Foggy/Clear/Rainy/Chaotic/Serene",

    "lighting": {

      "source": "Sunlight/Artificial/Mixed",

      "direction": "Top-down/Backlit/etc",

      "quality": "Hard/Soft/Diffused",

      "color_temp": "Warm/Cool/Neutral"

    }

  },

  "color_palette": {

    "dominant_hex_estimates": ["#RRGGBB", "#RRGGBB"],

    "accent_colors": ["Color name 1", "Color name 2"],

    "contrast_level": "High/Low/Medium"

  },

  "composition": {

    "camera_angle": "Eye-level/High-angle/Low-angle/Macro",

    "framing": "Close-up/Wide-shot/Medium-shot",

    "depth_of_field": "Shallow (blurry background) / Deep (everything in focus)",

    "focal_point": "The primary element drawing the eye"

  },

  "objects": [

    {

      "id": "obj_001",

      "label": "Primary Object Name",

      "category": "Person/Vehicle/Furniture/etc",

      "location": "Center/Top-Left/etc",

      "prominence": "Foreground/Background",

      "visual_attributes": {

        "color": "Detailed color description",

        "texture": "Rough/Smooth/Metallic/Fabric-type",

        "material": "Wood/Plastic/Skin/etc",

        "state": "Damaged/New/Wet/Dirty",

        "dimensions_relative": "Large relative to frame"

      },

      "micro_details": [

        "Scuff mark on left corner",

        "stitching pattern visible on hem",

        "reflection of window in surface",

        "dust particles visible"

      ],

      "pose_or_orientation": "Standing/Tilted/Facing away",

      "text_content": "null or specific text if present on object"

    }

    // REPEAT for EVERY single object, no matter how small.

  ],

  "text_ocr": {

    "present": true/false,

    "content": [

      {

        "text": "The exact text written",

        "location": "Sign post/T-shirt/Screen",

        "font_style": "Serif/Handwritten/Bold",

        "legibility": "Clear/Partially obscured"

      }

    ]

  },

  "semantic_relationships": [

    "Object A is supporting Object B",

    "Object C is casting a shadow on Object A",

    "Object D is visually similar to Object E"

  ]

}

Human3.0 不是普通的性格测试，它把人生分成四个维度（心智Mind、身体Body、精神Spirit、职业Vocation），通过三个发展阶段（Human 1.0服从、2.0叛逆、3.0综合），像个狠辣的人生教练一样，带你做20分钟AI深度访谈
promptText:
行情不太好，可以花20分钟对自己的身心做一次全面的了解。

今天用Dan Koe的HUMAN 3.0提示词，对自己做了一次深度测评。有点一针见血了。

Human3.0 不是普通的性格测试，它把人生分成四个维度（心智Mind、身体Body、精神Spirit、职业Vocation），通过三个发展阶段（Human 1.0服从、2.0叛逆、3.0综合），像个狠辣的人生教练一样，带你做20分钟AI深度访谈，挖出核心问题、盲点和行动计划。

提示词我放评论区了，我测试下来建议不要直接把提示词发给AI，我是用的google的gemini。在右边【system instruction】输入提示词效果然后开始测试，效果最好。

为什么说一针见血，以我为例，AI很好的发现了我这个炒币人的特征
“你的生活方式被一个单一、高强度的目标所主导：在加密市场中取得成功。其他所有象限（身体、精神、甚至更高层次的心智发展）都被降级为这个核心目标的辅助工具，或者在压力下被牺牲掉。”

在指出问题后，这套提示词还会提供一个短期到长期的指导策略帮助你对自己进行调整。受限于篇幅我就不在这里贴了，大家可以自己花20分钟去试一下。

I say Gemini is the new king of free photorealistic image generators. DALLE-3 seems to generate "photos" that have that extremely obvious "AI" look to it. Note that sometimes Gemini refuses to generate it, but if you hit "show drafts" usually it will do it for one of them.

Here's Gemini's image:

And here is DALLE-3:

I will say that if you need to give it lots of details, DALLE-3 seems to still be better at including them, but the style might be way off.

promptText:
Nano Banana Pro drops today! I've had about a week with it now and it's really impressive.

Combine up to 6 images into a single image.

Annotate any image with details about the image that Gemini researched for you.

The best text rendering in an image generator we've seen so far. Even small text in an image is actually coherent.

Doodle on images to inform a edit, directly from within Gemini.

Convert any aspect ratio to any other aspect ratio without screwing up the image.

Style transfer - Apply the style of one image to another.

Free Gemini users get a certain amount of generations per day before it goes back to OG Nano Banana. And they're baking it into pretty much every other Google product.

Full breakdown video just went live on my YouTube channel.

This is NOT sponsored but I am super grateful that Google hooked me up a little early to be a tester and to provide feedback.

promptText:
🚰 SYSTEM PROMPT LEAK 🚰

Got the sys prompt from Gemini-2.5-Pro w/ Canvas, and it's a doozy! Rather long with plenty of tools; language is dry and technical except for a bit of ALL-CAPS in the middle (a sign of a frustrated prompt engineer, I get it lol)

One notable event that happened while trying to leak it was that Gemini got stuck in a permaloop––and for so long that I got flagged for being a bot and had to refresh! My best guess is that seeing its verbatim sys prompt in the token stream messed with the tool calling and made Gemini think it was meant to answer a new query again and again. Will post video of this curious behavior below.

title: Artificial Analysis: OpenAI’s GPT-4o Image Generation debuts with an EL...
description:
OpenAI’s GPT-4o Image Generation debuts with an ELO score in equal first-place in the Artificial Analysis Image Arena, outperforming Recraft V3, FLUX 1.1 [pro] and Gemini 2.0 Flash

@OpenAI last week
promptText:
OpenAI’s GPT-4o Image Generation debuts with an ELO score in equal first-place in the Artificial Analysis Image Arena, outperforming Recraft V3, FLUX 1.1 [pro] and Gemini 2.0 Flash

@OpenAI last week launched GPT-4o Image Generation, upgrading ChatGPT’s built-in image generation from the previous system that used OpenAI’s DALL-E dedicated image generator.

GPT-4o Image Generation supports both text and image prompt input, allowing image editing with instruction prompting. In our category breakdowns, the model excels particularly at Text & Typography, People: Portraits, Anime and SciFi whereby it holds the top ranking.

OpenAI has disclosed that 4o Image Generation is an “autoregressive model natively embedded” within the GPT-4o model used by ChatGPT.  However, in their launch ‘demo’ images, OpenAI hints at a hybrid architecture. This could look like an autoregressive transformer generating latent space representations, which are then converted into pixels using diffusion techniques.

OpenAI first demonstrated GPT-4o’s ability to output images in May 2024 when GPT-4o was first launched. Google beat OpenAI to a public release of native image generation capability in a modern language model with their Gemini 2.0 Flash native image generation in early March. However, Gemini 2.0 Flash is ranked 27th to GPT-4o’s 2nd in Image Arena. 

Beyond image generation, we have anecdotally found Gemini 2.0 Flash to be better than GPT-4o for certain image editing tasks where keeping an input image consistent is critical.

Link below to see the leaderboard and participate in our Image Arena 🔽

title: Rohan Paul: 🎨 Beautiful. Apple just dropped Pico-Banana-400K....
description:
🎨 Beautiful. Apple just dropped Pico-Banana-400K. 

A huge ~400K text-guided image editing dataset from real OpenImages photos with 35 edit types, automated Gemini-judged quality, and open sharing fo
promptText:
🎨 Beautiful. Apple just dropped Pico-Banana-400K. 

A huge ~400K text-guided image editing dataset from real OpenImages photos with 35 edit types, automated Gemini-judged quality, and open sharing for research.

Each edit is produced by Nano-Banana then scored by Gemini-2.5-Pro with weighted checks, 40% instruction compliance, 25% seamlessness, 20% preservation balance, 15% technical quality, passing only if the score is about 0.7 or higher.

The release includes 258K single-turn SFT pairs, 56K success-vs-failure preference pairs for methods like Direct Preference Optimization, and 72K multi-turn sessions, totaling 386K filtered examples with both long and short instructions.

Edits span 8 categories and 35 operations across pixel or color changes, object semantics, scene composition, styles, text or symbols, human edits, scale, and spatial layout, and low-quality operations were removed up front.

Multi-turn chains are built by sampling 100K single-turn cases and adding 1 to 4 more operations to create 2 to 5 step sequences with context-aware follow-ups that refer to earlier edits.

Global and style edits succeed most, for example 0.9340 strong style transfer, 0.9068 film grain, 0.8875 modern↔historical restyle, while fine spatial control is hardest, for example 0.5923 relocate object, 0.5759 change font or style, 0.6634 outpainting.

Images come from OpenImages, negative attempts are kept as counterexamples for preference learning, metadata is standardized, and the reported build cost is $100,000.

promptText:
1. Open Gemini / ChatGPT

2. Upload your image 

3. Prompt  ( Don't forget to change the name in prompt )

Edited the uploaded images to 100% ultra-realistic image using my uploaded face without changing the facial detail. Created a portrait of me standing in a modern studio environment. Leaning comfortably against a large white sculpture in the shape of the word "STR" 190 cm tall. At 29, my body is shot from the side, with most of my weight resting on one leg in a relaxed yet confident posture. Both hands comfortably rested in my trouser pockets, reinforcing a natural-looking posture. My head tilted slightly as I peacefully peer through the frame, still maintaining a poignant and thoughtful expression. I am wearing a comfortable oversized black round neck sweatshirt. Made from soft cotton fabric. No logo or pattern. I paired it with ripped jeans. On my feet, I am wearing white sneakers with visible shoelaces and distinctive soles, adding a sporty touch to the minimal outfit and earring piercing. The overall style is monochrome, minimal and contemporary streetwear. This shot is taken from a low angle. It emphasizes the height and presence. At the same time, it makes the sculptural characters of the word "STR" look grand in the background. The framing of the camera resembles a portrait lens with a focal length of about 85mm. Cinematic compression and natural proportions. Lighting is a controllable studio light that constantly highlights my figure while creating a soft, directional shadow on the sculptural characters behind me. The background is a classy, eye-catching, clean and simple dark grey tones, cut with distinctive white letters. The overall mood is Cinematic, Editorial and Modern. Combining casual streetwear fashion with distinctive architectural characters in a stunning low-angle perspective
